channel.title: How to change youre stats in testscape?
channel.description: i have built a server but i cant put online becouse people would be higher than the owner :o so how to change the stats without training on testscape

item.title: How to change youre stats in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Ug, try this one…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); addSkillXP(1400000000, 3); addSkillXP(1400000000, 4); addSkillXP(1400000000, 5); addSkillXP(1400000000, 6); addSkillXP(1400000000, 7); addSkillXP(1400000000, 8); addSkillXP(1400000000, 9); addSkillXP(1400000000, 10); addSkillXP(1400000000, 11); addSkillXP(1400000000, 12); addSkillXP(1400000000, 13); addSkillXP(1400000000, 14); addSkillXP(1400000000, 15); addSkillXP(1400000000, 16); addSkillXP(1400000000, 17); addSkillXP(1400000000, 18); addSkillXP(1400000000, 19); addSkillXP(1400000000, 20); addSkillXP(1400000000, 21); addSkillXP(1400000000, 22); addSkillXP(1400000000, 23); addSkillXP(1400000000, 24); sendMessage("Your Superman, but can you fly?"); }

item.title: How to change youre stats in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @zauruke zauruke
item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

go to character.

right click and go to new, click on textpad.

then you make the name you want it to be on textpad.

go in that text pad, copy and past this in there.

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = (name)
character-password = (password)

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3210
character-posy = 3425
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 5.111.102.23
character-lastlogin = 20070211
character-energy = 32
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 2100

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1050 1
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 4151 1
character-equip = 4 4720 1
character-equip = 5 1199 1
character-equip = 6 0 0
character-equip = 7 4722 1
character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 0 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 71 854600
character-skill = 1 63 376600

character-skill = 3 17 1001355
character-skill = 4 80 2008500
character-skill = 5 101 16803080
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

[ITEMS]
character-item = 0 996 38988
character-item = 1 5681 1

[BANK]
character-bank = 0 4152 1
character-bank = 1 7159 1
character-bank = 2 1374 1

item.title: How to change youre stats in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Add this cmd:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); addSkillXP(1400000000, 3); addSkillXP(1400000000, 4); addSkillXP(1400000000, 5); addSkillXP(1400000000, 6); addSkillXP(1400000000, 7); addSkillXP(1400000000, 8); addSkillXP(1400000000, 9); addSkillXP(1400000000, 10); addSkillXP(1400000000, 11); addSkillXP(1400000000, 12); addSkillXP(1400000000, 13); addSkillXP(1400000000, 14); addSkillXP(1400000000, 15); addSkillXP(1400000000, 16); addSkillXP(1400000000, 17); addSkillXP(1400000000, 18); addSkillXP(1400000000, 19); addSkillXP(1400000000, 20); addSkillXP(1400000000, 21); addSkillXP(1400000000, 22); addSkillXP(1400000000, 23); addSkillXP(1400000000, 24); sendMessage("Your Superman, but can you fly?"); }

change the exp and lvl to what you want…
